article.title: Jones Assigned to U.S. Army Maneuver Center of Excellence

tags.tag: U.S. Army Maneuver Center of Excellence

article.abstract: Brig. Gen. Peter L. Jones, USA, has been assigned as commandant, U.S. Army Infantry School, U.S. Army Maneuver Center of Excellence, Fort Benning, Georgia.
article.text: Brig. Gen. Peter L. Jones, USA, has been assigned as commandant, U.S. Army Infantry School, U.S. Army Maneuver Center of Excellence, FortÂ Benning, Georgia.
